title: Message to the Congress on Imposing Sanctions with Respect to Iran – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 24, 2019
TO THE CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES:Pursuant to the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (50 U.S.C. 1701 et seq.) (IEEPA), I hereby report that I have issued an Executive Order with respect to Iran that takes additional steps with respect to the national emergency declared in Executive Order 12957 of March 15, 1995.I am enclosing a copy of the order I have issued.DONALD J. TRUMPTHE WHITE HOUSE,
June 24, 2019.
